LandingPage.title: Real-World Next.js Starter Templates for Developers
LandingPage.description: NextSampler offers production-ready Next.js templates that help you start your projects faster. Browse real-world examples, clean code, and integrated tools like Supabase and Tailwind CSS.

FeaturesPage.title: Features – What's Included in NextSampler Templates
FeaturesPage.description: Discover the key features of every NextSampler template, including authentication, database integration, file uploads, responsive design, and production-ready setup using Supabase, Tailwind CSS, and more.
FeaturesPage.key_feature_description_0: Built with the latest Next.js 15 App Router structure to efficiently manage routing and data flow.
FeaturesPage.key_feature_description_1: Rapid styling with utility-first classes, supporting custom animations and scalable design.
FeaturesPage.key_feature_description_2: Static typing ensures safer code and a more collaborative, maintainable development environment.
FeaturesPage.key_feature_description_3: Accessible, responsive UIs built with Radix UI, Lucide, and Tailwind plugins.
FeaturesPage.key_feature_description_4: Authentication, data storage, and SSR support with Supabase — no backend needed.
FeaturesPage.key_feature_description_5: Easily implement i18n and dark mode with next-intl and next-themes.
FeaturesPage.key_feature_description_6: Smooth UI interaction and notifications with motion, sonner, and tailwind-animate.

ShowCasePage.title: Showcase – Real Projects Built with NextSampler
ShowCasePage.description: Explore real-world projects built using NextSampler templates. See how developers use our Next.js boilerplates to build web apps faster with Supabase, Tailwind CSS, authentication, and more.
ShowCasePage.showcase_0_description: A practical dashboard example with various statistics. Built on Next.js and TailwindCSS for scalability and maintainability.
ShowCasePage.showcase_1_description: A collection of frequently used UI components. Composed of various elements like buttons, input fields, modals, and tabs based on Radix UI.
ShowCasePage.showcase_2_description: A note-taking example with simple text editing and saving features.
ShowCasePage.showcase_3_description: A basic profile page where users can view their information.

PricingPage.title: Pricing – Get Access to Premium Next.js Templates
PricingPage.description: Choose a plan that fits your needs. Get instant access to high-quality Next.js templates with features like Supabase integration, authentication, file uploads, and responsive UI – all for a one-time payment.

Main.title: Kickstart Your Next.js Project with Our Free Starter Template (<important>NextSampler</important>)
Main.description: Explore our open-source Next.js 15 App Router starter, crafted with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Radix UI. Ready to deploy and easy to customize.

DemoDownload.description: NextSampler provides the full source code of this page and more — ready for commercial use.

Features.section_description: NextSampler carefully selects only the best technologies for modern and practical web development.
Features.feature1_description: Built on Next.js 15 App Router, NextSampler delivers exceptional speed and flexibility. By separating server and client components, it achieves high scalability and maintainability.
Features.feature2_description: Powered by React, NextSampler offers highly interactive and user-friendly UIs. Leveraging React 18 features, it achieves optimal performance and simplified code structure.
Features.feature3_description: With Tailwind CSS, we achieve fast and consistent styling. Our utility-first approach ensures responsive designs and enhances maintainability across the codebase.
Features.feature4_description: By adopting TypeScript, we prevent code errors early and significantly boost developer productivity. Our codebase is designed for stability and collaborative efficiency.
Features.feature5_description: Through Supabase, we easily integrate open-source database and authentication services. Our backend environment supports scalability and real-time capabilities.
Features.feature6_description: Radix UI is an accessible and flexible UI component library for React applications. It provides a variety of basic components that make it easy for developers to build user interfaces.

FirstHero.title: Kickstart Your Next.js Project in Minutes
FirstHero.description: NextSampler delivers production-ready Next.js 15 templates, crafted with TypeScript, TailwindCSS, and Radix UI. Build faster, deploy smarter, and focus on what truly matters — your ideas.
FirstHero.reviewer_opinion: nextjs boilerplate is revolutionary - it has quickly streamlined our data processes!

SecondHero.title: Start Your Next.js Project Faster Than Ever
SecondHero.description: NextSampler offers production-ready Next.js 15 templates that you can use without complex setup. Focus on your ideas — we’ll handle the groundwork.
SecondHero.reviewer_opinion: The nextjs boilerplate has revolutionised our development process - smooth, secure, and simple!

ExampleShowcase.page_description: NextSampler offers a variety of example templates, each designed for immediate use in real-world applications. Check out the examples below.
ExampleShowcase.showcase1_description: A production-ready dashboard template with various analytics. Built with Next.js and TailwindCSS for scalability and maintainability.
ExampleShowcase.showcase2_description: A note-taking example with simple text editing and saving features.
ExampleShowcase.showcase3_description: A curated set of reusable UI components like buttons, inputs, modals, and tabs. Built on top of Radix UI for accessibility and customization.

Process.title: The Complete Guide to Next.js Boilerplate
Process.description: This guide introduces you to all the features of Next.js boilerplate and walks you through how to install and use them step-by-step. Discover the benefits and unique selling points of each feature, easily install them, and put them to good use with common use cases.
Process.step1_description: Learn all the features of the Next.js boilerplate, and see the benefits and unique selling points of each feature.
Process.step2_description: Make it easy with our step-by-step guide on how to install Boilerplate.
Process.step3_description: After installation, we'll show you how to use the Next.js boilerplate and explain common use cases.

FAQ.section_description: Find answers to common questions about Next.js Boilerplate and learn how to get started quickly.
FAQ.answer1: Next.js Boilerplate provides basic Next.js setup, as well as routing, state management, API communication, styling, test setup, and more. This allows developers to get started quickly and easily add the features they need.
FAQ.question2: How do I install this project?
FAQ.answer2: Next.js Boilerplate is available by cloning it from GitHub. Simply follow the installation guide to install the necessary dependencies, set up environment variables, and start the development server with the npm run dev command.
FAQ.question3: What is the licence for Next.js Boilerplate?
FAQ.answer3: Next.js Boilerplate is under the MIT licence. This allows anyone to use, modify, and distribute it freely. However, you must retain the original copyright and licence notices.
FAQ.question4: How do I implement user authentication in Next.js Boilerplate?
FAQ.answer4: Next.js Boilerplate provides a basic structure for user authentication. It's set up to make it easy to integrate authentication methods like JSON Web Token (JWT) or OAuth, and you can see how to implement them in the related documentation.
FAQ.question5: How easy is it to customise Next.js Boilerplate?
FAQ.answer5: Next.js Boilerplate is designed with a modular structure, making it easy to customise to your needs. You're free to modify and add components, pages, API routes, and more, and the documentation provides a guide on how to customise it.
